TestReportSteps.testObjective: Verify that the newly added crash record got added in the 'Crash Distribution for month of year report'
TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Verify user is able to see the count against the month and severity in the table is incremented by count 1
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to see the updated report
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to see the updated report
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to see the updated report

TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Verify user is able to see the total count against the month in the table is incremented by count 1
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to see the updated report
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to see the updated report
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to see the updated report

TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Verify user is able to see the total count against the severity in the table is incremented by count 1
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to see the updated report
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to see the updated report
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to see the updated report

TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Verify user is able to see the grand total count in the table is incremented by count 1
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to see the updated report
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to see the updated report
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to see the updated report

TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Verify that the user is able to see all other values in the table with no changes
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to see all other values in the table with no changes
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to see all other values in the table with no changes
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to see all other values in the table with no changes
